title: What plastics, by number symbol, should be recycled at New Hanover County recyling centers, and what actually becomes of the materials deposited at a site?
text:
According to the New Hanover County Environmenal Management
Department, the county recycling centers accept plastic containers
numbered one through seven, but does not accept plastic bags or foam
plastic.



For information on what recycled plastic is used for:



http://environment.about.com/od/earthtalkcolumns/a/recycleplastics.htm
